title: Projection of protest messages onto Twitter headquarters in SF by activist Alan Marling
brief_description: On November 18, self-described ‘projection activist’ Alan Marling used a neighboring building to project messages of protest and disdain towards Elon Musk, on to the facade of Twitter HQ in San Francsisco. Phrases such as, “Musk’s Hellscape” and “Worthless billionare’ were projected in large white text across the building for over an hour to call in to question Musk’s ethics, investments and further highlight the current conditions of his employees at Twitter since he toko over the company in October. Marling began protesting outside Twitter HQ back in 2017 to stand against Donald Trump’s presidency and use of Twitter as public platform.
